cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on November 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5607, Justice for ALS Veterans Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 183 (Tuesday, October 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SLOTKIN:
H.R. 5607.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I. Section 8, Clause 1: The Congress shall have
Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises,
to pay the Debts and provide for the common Defence and
general Welfare of the United States; but all Duties, Imposts
and Excises shall be uniform throughout the United States.
[Page H5673]

latestAction.text: Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs Discharged.

title: Justice for ALS Veterans Act of 2021
